title: Hybrid Mathematics Information Literacy Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Emphasizing Mathematics Information Searching, Analysis, and Evaluation Competencies Applicable to Work for Current Practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply a 5-step systematic process for searching mathematical information to select credible resources with 80% accuracy
Learners achieve a 90% submission rate by writing reports evaluating math data bias in VR simulation environments using three criteria
Learners can write three or more reflective journals documenting research processes in digital notebooks and earn over 4 points (5-point scale) in peer reviews
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
